TEXT.TITLE: CONCORD FABRICS INC <CIS> 2ND QTR OPER NET
TEXT.BODY: Ended March one Oper shr 47 cts vs 41 cts Oper net 840,484 vs 732,000 Revs 36.6 mln vs 31.1 mln Six mths Oper shr 77 cts vs 75 cts Oper net 1,379,453 vs 1,338,346 Revs 68.2 mln vs 58.5 mln NOTE: Excludes net gain of 27,000 dlrs or 15 cts/shr in current qtr and six mths from disposal of discontinued operations. Year-ago excludes loss of 54,808 dlrs or three cts in qtr and 126,749 dlrs or seven cts in six mths from discontinued operations. Reuter
